title: Eight Desolate Sword God - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Absent Parents   Arranged Marriage   Beasts   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Fast Cultivation   Handsome Male Lead   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Inheritance   Male Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Romantic Subplot   Soul Power   Souls   Spirit Users   Time Skip   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong
author: Tears And Rain   云泪天雨
description:
Cultivators all have a soul beast, one that awakens at 13 years old. 
However, Ye Chenfeng lacks one and is subsequently banished.
Ye Chenfeng obtains the favor of the heavens after years of humiliation. 
With his gifts, he will walk his path to the strongest.>
